display_long_description:
Real Carrom
Welcome to Real Carrom, where tradition meets modern gaming. Engage in one of the most beloved board games, now enhanced with immersive virtual reality features.

🔳 Game Modes
Black and White: Stay true to the classic Carrom style—pocket your assigned coins before your opponent.

Freestyle: Pocket any coin and rack up points to outscore your rivals.

Trickshots: Master the board with challenging, skill-based puzzles that test your precision and creativity.

🔳 Single Player
Test your skills against adaptive AI. Play solo, partner with an AI, or take on multiple AI opponents for endless challenges.

🔳 Multiplayer Magic
Experience seamless multiplayer with four unique ways to play:

1v1 Duel: Traditional head-to-head matches against a single opponent.

Co-op Challenge (2v1): Team up with a friend to take down a powerful AI.

Hybrid Doubles: Partner with an AI to face off against another P+AI team.

Full House (2v2): The ultimate social experience—four human players in a classic doubles match.

🔳 Immersive Features
Hands & Controllers: Play your way with full support for both physical joysticks and OVR microgestures.

Mixed Reality: Bring the Carrom board into your physical space for an immersive experience.

Voice Chat: Talk to opponents and teammates in real time.

Meta Avatars: Flaunt your personalized, high-fidelity avatar.

Lip-Sync: Experience realistic matches with natural lip movement.

Ready to strike?
